oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Drama -- Lebanon
Lebanese actors
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Abu Ali al-Asmarani . A play. The Orly Cinema Theater presents for the tenth week with great success: 1974. Starring Nidal Al-Ashqar and Antoine Kerbage. Music by Ziad Rahbani. Directed by Berj Vazlian.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Abu Ali al-Asmarani
